register.description: View Mode Register. It selects full-view mode or ping-pong view mode.

bitfield.description: Reserved. 0 will be returned at Read, and Write will be ignored.
View mode selection for ersdbuf. 0x0: Full view mode is selected. 0x1: Ping-pong view mode is selected.
View mode selection for ecdabuf. 0x0: Full view mode is selected. 0x1: Ping-pong view mode is selected.

register.description: Master ID 1 Register Select master between HWA and DMA bus. This register is used in both full view and ping-pong view mode. This register is for buffers which has two physical memories. This register is affected by direct_switch_pi input port.

bitfield.description: Reserved. 0 will be returned at Read, and Write will be ignored.

Master selection for ersdbuf B. This bit is used in only ping-pong view mode. 0x0: Buffer B is assigned to DMA 0x1: Buffer B is assigned to HWA. This bit has no effect in full view mode. If direct_switch_pi is high, the value of this bit is inverted.

Master selection for ersdbuf A. This bit is used in both full view and ping-pong view mode. In full view mode: 0x0: In full view mode, both buffer A and B are assigned to DMA 0x1: Both buffer A and B are assigned to HWA. In ping-pong view mode: 0x0: Buffer A is assigned to DMA 0x1: Buffer A is assigned to HWA. Buffer B is not affected in ping-pong view mode. If direct_switch_pi is high, the value of this bit is inverted.

Master selection for ecdabuf B. This bit is used in only ping-pong view mode. 0x0: Buffer B is assigned to DMA 0x1: Buffer B is assigned to HWA. This bit has no effect in full view mode. If direct_switch_pi is high, the value of this bit is inverted.

Master selection for ecdabuf A. This bit is used in both full view and ping-pong view mode. In full view mode: 0x0: Both buffer A and B are assigned to DMA 0x1: Both buffer A and B are assigned to HWA. In ping-pong view mode: 0x0: Buffer A is assigned to DMA 0x1: Buffer A is assigned to HWA. Buffer B is not affected in ping-pong view mode. If direct_switch_pi is high, the value of this bit is inverted.

register.description: Master ID 1 Register Select master between HWA and DMA bus. This register is for buffers which has only one physical memory. This register is NOT affected by direct_switch_pi input port.

bitfield.description: Reserved. 0 will be returned at Read, and Write will be ignored.
Master selection for ecdwbuf. 0x0: The buffer is assigned to DMA 0x1:The buffer is assigned to HWA.
